name: actix_web_helper
description: Module with several helper methods for actix-web

methods.name: get_property
methods.description: Get a property from the request url

input.name: field
input.description: The field to get from the URL

output.name: out
output.description: The field from the URL, or an empty string

input.name: format
input.description: The format, the first {} will be replaced with arg0

input.name: arg0
input.description: The value to replace in the format

output.name: out
output.description: The field from the URL, or an empty string
